We use RepeatedTest with the SwingUI and the tests work i.e. if we 
run the RepeatedTest 10 times , ten tests are run and JUnit displays 
the green bar and the "Finished: x.xx seconds" message.

However , we have noted that the green tick on the test box in 
the "Test Hierarchy" window is never displayed and we can't figure 
out why.

Does anyone know why ?

Thanks
subject: RepeatedTest - SwingUI
